mapper.select: SELECT A.RN, A.BBS_NO, A.ID, A.BBS_TITLE, A.IP, A.CREATE_DATE, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO, A.GROUP_ORDER, A.BBS_LAST_MODIFY_DATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, GROUP_ORDER ASC) AS RN, BBS_NO, ID, BBS_TITLE, IP, CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORDER, BBS_LAST_MODIFY_DATE FROM BBS) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS (BBS_NO, ID, BBS_TITLE, IP, CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORDER, BBS_LAST_MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{bbsTitle}, #{ip}, SYSDATE, 1, 0, BBS_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO BBS (BBS_NO, ID, BBS_TITLE, IP, CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORDER, BBS_LAST_MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{bbsTitle}, #{ip}, SYSDATE, 1, #{depth}, #{groupNo}, #{groupOrder}, SYSDATE)
